fixes.name: MTM (in CAD) T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR useCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR endDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    useCustom,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MTM (in CAD)],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = endDateParam,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MTM (in CAD)],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau parameter references with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]). Translated nested IF logic to DAX IF and preserved row-level comparisons and outputs. All column references were converted to the 'Table'[Column] format using the provided table name.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
